title: Special Edition: Journalist Rana Ayyub on Why Social Distancing Is a Privilege
itunes:title: Special Edition: Journalist Rana Ayyub on Why Social Distancing Is a Privilege
itunes:subtitle: In the latest special edition of the BoF Podcast, Indian journalist and author Rana Ayyub joins BoF’s Editor-in-Chief Imran Amed to discuss the impact of Covid-19 on the lives thousands of migrant labourers, many of whom work in India's now-shuttered te
description:
In the latest special edition of the BoF Podcast, Indian journalist and author Rana Ayyub joins BoF’s Editor-in-Chief Imran Amed to discuss the impact of Covid-19 on the lives thousands of migrant labourers, many of whom work in India's now-shuttered textile industry.

 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here.
